A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I grew up loving Luke\, Han\, and Leia and the robots. Now\, Han is murdered by his own son and Leia flies through the vacuum of space and Luke nearly kills his nephew in his sleep? No thanks\, Disney. These are not only not good Star Wars stories\, they are not even good stories. I will never watch Disney Star Wars again. You will not get my hard-earned money for your tripe.
